title: Police identify 59 social media groups instigated violent incidents
body_lines: Some 59 social media groups and thier admins which used to gather people for the violent incidents on Monday (May 9) have been identified, police said.
They said that investigations are underway to trace them under the Computer Crimes Act and the Criminal Law Act.

Meanwhile, Police said public can share any information with the police about social media groups and individuals who have been involved in such acts of violence through toll free telephone number 1997 or by email telligp@police.gov.lk (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
